int bt_client_add_file ( void *  bto,
const char *  fname,
const int  fname_len,
const int  flen 
)

Add this file to the bittorrent client

This is used for adding new files.

Parameters:
idid of bt client
fnamefile name
fname_lenlength of fname
flenlength in bytes of the file
Returns:
1 on sucess; otherwise 0

void bt_client_set_npieces ( void *  bto,
int  npieces 
)

How many pieces are there of this file?

Note: bt_read_torrent_file sets this The size of a piece is determined by the publisher of the torrent. A good recommendation is to use a piece size so that the metainfo file does not exceed 70 kilobytes.

void bt_client_set_opt_shutdown_when_completed ( void *  bto,
const int  flag 
)

Set shutdown when completed flag

If this is set, the client will shutdown when the download is completed.

Returns:
1 on success, 255 if the option doesn't exist, 0 otherwise
